author: MetalMaarten
post_text: March 12, 2015 at 5:03 PM#1Hi,Trying to figure out how to remove the patch from a channel. I noticed that the assign keyword has the /reset function. But what is the syntax for this?Assign channel 101 at /rAssign channel 101 at dmx /rAssign channel 101 /rBut this does not result in an empty patch for this channel.Thanks,Maarten
